features: WHITE SHIRT, BLACK SHIRT, NO PROBLEM: Degree UltraClear Black+White Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers 72-hour sweat and odor protection with anti-white marks and anti-yellow stains technology
YOU MOVE, IT WORKS: Our breakthrough MotionSense technology works in sync with your body all day long. This deodorant for men releases a subtle burst of fragrance every time you move
DRESS WITH CONFIDENCE: This antiperspirant for men is made with anti-mark and anti-stain technology that protects your clothes from deodorant stains
INVIGORATING SCENT: Degree Men UltraClear Black+White Antiperspirant Deodorant keeps you feeling fresh all day with a warm, woody scent
RECYCLE WITH DEGREE: As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging
body.description: Degree Men UltraClear Black + White Antiperspirant Deodorant with long-lasting MotionSense technology is specially designed to keep your clothes looking new. No white marks on black clothes and no yellow stains on white clothes. You'll look great all day and free from deodorant stains. This antiperspirant for men has a formula that cuts down on the stains that some antiperspirants leave behind when they mix with sweat and natural oils produced by your body. It also provides 72-hour sweat and odor protection to keep you moving and free to live life to its fullest. This antiperspirant deodorant stick also contains Degree's innovative MotionSense technology. It works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules, and they release more fragrance. So, every time you move, Degree keeps you fresh and free from odor. This antiperspirant deodorant stick works as hard as you do, keeping you protected, so you can keep moving and stay active. Simply glide and get moving. At Degree, we're doing everything we can to help keep the planet moving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep moving with Degree Men UltraClear Black+White Antiperspirant Deodorant. This antiperspirant deodorant combats stains and provides 72-hour sweat and odor protection to keep you feeling fresh all day.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This antiperspirant deodorant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Works in sync with your body to release bursts of fragrance, keeping you fresh all day. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD SUSTAINABILITY At Degree, we're committed to creating the most sustainable and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we're making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Men Advanced Cool Rush Antiperspirant, 2.7 oz Degree Men UltraClear Black+White Ocean Air Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Degree Men UltraClear Black+White Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray, 3.8 oz Main Benefit This antiperspirant for men features a crisp, arctic scent to keep you feeling fresh and energized. This antiperspirant deodorant for men features MotionSense technology which releases a fresh burst of clean, airy scent every time you move. It helps prevent white marks and yellow stains on your clothes. This antiperspirant deodorant dry spray delivers 72 hours of protection against sweat and odor with anti-stains and anti-mark technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell great and does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Full day of work, no stains, no odors, glad got recommend these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This antiperspirant/deodorant actually protects and prevents your white t-shirts from yellowing in the armpit. Also, it prevents your black t-shirts, wifebeaters, etc., from the excessive accumulation of product, which is known to turn the armpit area white. At the same time, it genuinely works as a antiperspirant, and has a lasting, but not overpowerful, scent that you are sure to like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good antiperspirant
reviews.reviewText: This works well and has a pleasant non-overpowering scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I smell great.
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant deodorizes. Imagine that. And it smells nice, not overpowering at all. Just a clean, subtle, masculine scent. The main reason I purchased this brand is because it does not show on white shirts like old spice or other colored deodorants do. Plus, this two pack is much cheaper than buying a single stick at the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite deodorant
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite deodorant. The scent is great and it lasts a long time. It does still leave some white marks on black T-shirts, but they wipe off very easily. I'd definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice smelling deodorant that leaves few marks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some of the best to stay clean and not be a white stain mess
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is truly great, affordable, quality and keeps my cloths looking good and not have pit stains!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love this deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this deodorant for my husband with our monthly subscribe and save order. The subscribe and save makes it extremely convenient. This is my husbands favorite deodorant because it works well and lasts a long time. He prefers the solid sticks to the gels.Buying a 4 pack of deodorant ensures that he will not run out .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and scent
reviews.reviewText: This product has a great scent and value. I only use this brand and type of deodorant because of the various colors I wear on a given day. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Son excelentes los mejores que existan
reviews.reviewText: Sonará exagerado pero este desodorante solo me doy una o dos pasadas y me dura todo el día no me da mal honor aunque sude aunque haga ejercicio. Es la segunda ves que los compro y es el mejor desodorante que he conocido y no mancha la ropa ni la blanca super garantizado
